definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: structure (colonnade ?) attached to W. side of Solomon's temple; pl. [[פַּרְוׇרִים]] 2Ki 23:11; appar. same word in sg. [[פַּרְבָּר]] 1Ch 26:18, 1Ch 26:18 (all c. art.) (Thes cp. Pers. farow0r open kiosk, summer-house (lit. light-bearer). whence perhaps ´[[פ]] as loan-word, cf. Mishn. [[פַּרְוׇוד]], [[פַּרְוׇאר]], Targum [[פַּרְוׇורָא]] suburd (made up of villas, summer-houses Thes); ´[[פ]] then post-ex. insertion in 2Ki 23:11; cf. further Dr in Hastings:DB).
